item.title: JavaScript(1)
item.description:
Opening Window

<script type="text/javascript">
  function popup(url) {
    popUpWindow=windows.open(
      url,'popUpWindow','height=300,width=400,scrollbar=yes,toolbar=yes,menubar=no,status=yes'
    )
  }
</script>
<body>
<button type="button" value="open">
  <a href="JavaSCript:popup('url.php');">Click for Popup!
</a></button>
</body>



Closing Window


<script>
  function exit(){
    window.close();
  }
</script>
<body>
  <button type="button" value="close!">
    <a href="JavaSCript:exit();">Click to Close
  </a></button>
</body>

item.title: Split view like Windows or Linux - Spectacle
item.description:
Windows and Linux have split view shortcut commands available.

WHY NOT ON MAC?


Click Here to Install Spectacle

Once you go through simple downloading an app.
Directly extract it to Application folder or extract and move to the folder.

Customizable Commands

item.title: MarkDown Grammars
item.description:
1. Header 
# This is H1        
## This is H2
### This is H3
#### This is H4
##### This is H5
###### This is H6

Outputs:

This is H1

This is H2

This is H3

This is H4

This is H5
This is H6



2. Passage Indicator 

> First
> > Second
> > > Third

First

Second

Third



3. Lists 
  1. First
    * First
  2. Second
    - Second

  - First
    - Second
      - Third
  1. First
    • First
  2. Second
    • Second
  • First
    • Second
      • Third



4. Code


< pre > < code > 

<pre><code>Github</code></pre>

Github



  <pre><code>
  for i in range(1,2):
    print(i)
  </code></pre>

for i in range(1,2):
  print(i)



ps. If using a code highlighter (Applied from Blog Theme), any languages can be applied with Rouge



5. Horizontal Line 


---
************



6. Hyperlink


  • inLine URL
 [Google](https://www.google.com)
 <br>
 [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com)

Google
Facebook

Also can assign variables to add hyperlink

[Google][google]
<br>
[Facebook][facebook]

[google]: https://www.google.com
[facebook]: https://www.facebook.com

Google
Facebook



8. Text Format


Bold, Italic, CancelLine. No Underline Supported

*single asterisks*
_single underscores_
**double asterisks**
__double underscores__
~~cancelline~~

single asterisks
single underscores
double asterisks
double underscores
cancelline



9. Image


Image Name appears when image is not visible

![Image Name](url)
![Image Name](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20412850/34468412-ba059536-ef4b-11e7-90d4-3313e9fed8f9.png)



ps. Resizing

<img src="url" width="size">
<img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20412850/34468412-ba059536-ef4b-11e7-90d4-3313e9fed8f9.png" width="60%">



10. Insert Table
  • Table Generator
First Header  | Second Header
------------- | -------------
Content Cell  | Content Cell
Content Cell  | Content Cell


First Header Second Header
Content Cell Content Cell
Content Cell Content Cell

How to Arrange:

First Header  | Second Header | Third Header
:------------ | :-----------: | -----------:
Left          | Center        | Right


First Header Second Header Third Header
Left Center Right



11. Formula(Supported by Theme) 


$$ f(x) = \int \frac{2x^2+4x+6}{x-2} $$



12. Changing Font

Visit Google Fonts Replace the codes:
_config.yml
/_sass/base/_variables.scss






출처: devYurim Blog

item.title: PHP 데이터베이스 연동
item.description:
form이 들어간 html이고 데이터에서 어떤 데이터를 끌어올지 결정

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <style>
    h1 {
      font-family: fantasy;
    }
    label {
      font-family: monospace;
    }
    form {
      width: 450px;
      margin: auto;
      padding-bottom: 20px;
      border: 2px solid red;
      text-align: center;
    }
    input {
      width: 25%;
    }
    option {
      text-align: center;
    }
  </style>
  <head>
    <title>Main Gate of Database</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
  </head>
  <body>
    <form action = "database.php" method="post">
      <h1>Querying a MySQL database.</h1>
      <label>Select a field to display:
        <select name = "view" required>
          <option value="" disabled selected>--Select your Option--</option>
          <option value="all">*</option>
          <option value="id">ID</option>
          <option value="title">Title</option>
          <option value="category">Category</option>
          <option value="isbn">ISBN</option>
        </select>
      </label>
      <br><br>
      <input type="submit" name="submit" value="Send Query">
    </form>
  </body>
</html>

php파일로 html메인페이지에서 받았을떄 알고리즘 적용 카테고리 선택시 선택사항만 output

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <style>
    div.top {
      position: absolute;
      align-items: center;
      left: 30%;
    }
    div.bot {
      position: relative;
      top: 300px;
    }
    table {
      margin: auto;
      /*position:relative;
      top:100px;*/
      border: 2px solid red;
      color:yellow;
      border-color:blue;
      font-family: fantasy;
      text-align: center;
    }
    body {
      background-color: black;
      color: white;
      position: relative;
    }
  </style>
  <?php
    $dsn="mysql:host=localhost;dbname=books";
    $username="iw3htp";
    $password="password";
    $id=$_POST['view'];
    $cnt=0;
    try {
      $conn=new PDO($dsn,$username,$password);
      $conn->setAttribute(PDO::ATTR_ERRMODE,PDO::ERRMODE_EXCEPTION);
      $getAll=$conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM books");
      $getAll->execute();
    }catch(PDOException $e) {
      echo "Error: ".$e->getMessage();
    }
    $connect=null;
  ?>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <title>Selected contents</title>
  </head>
  <body>
    <?php
      $getAll=$conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM books ORDER BY id ASC");
      $getAll->execute();
     ?>
     <div class="top">
    <table border = 1>
      <?php
        switch($id) {
          case 'all':
            for ($i=0; $view=$getAll->fetch(); $i++) {
              $cnt=$i+1;?>
       <tr>
         <td><?php echo $view['id']?></td>
         <td><?php echo $view['title']?></td>
         <td><?php echo $view['category']?></td>
         <td><?php echo $view['isbn']?></td>
       </tr>
      <?php }
        break;

        case 'id':
        for ($i=0; $view=$getAll->fetch(); $i++) {
          $cnt=$i+1;?>
        <tr>
          <td><?php echo $view['id']?></td>
        </tr>
      <?php }
        break;

        case 'title':
        for ($i=0; $view=$getAll->fetch(); $i++) {
          $cnt=$i+1;?>
        <tr>
          <td><?php echo $view['title']?></td>
        </tr>
      <?php }
        break;

        case 'category':
        for ($i=0; $view=$getAll->fetch(); $i++) {
          $cnt=$i+1;?>
        <tr>
          <td><?php echo $view['category']?></td>
        </tr>
      <?php }
        break;

        case 'isbn':
        for ($i=0; $view=$getAll->fetch(); $i++) {
          $cnt=$i+1;?>
        <tr>
          <td><?php echo $view['isbn']?></td>
        </tr>
      <?php }
        break;
      }//end of switch
      ?></div>
      <div class="bot">
      <?php
        echo "Your search yielded ".$cnt." results.";
        echo "<p></p>";
        echo "Thank you for using our database."; ?>
    </div>
      </table>
  </body>
</html>

데이터베이스 코드

-- phpMyAdmin SQL Dump
-- version 4.8.3
-- https://www.phpmyadmin.net/
--
-- Host: 127.0.0.1
-- Generation Time: Oct 29, 2018 at 10:59 PM
-- Server version: 10.1.36-MariaDB
-- PHP Version: 7.2.11

SET SQL_MODE = "NO_AUTO_VALUE_ON_ZERO";
SET AUTOCOMMIT=0;
START TRANSACTION;
SET time_zone="+00:00";

DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS books;
CREATE DATABASE books;
USE books;

CREATE TABLE `books` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `title` text NOT NULL,
  `category` text NOT NULL,
  `isbn` int(11) NOT NULL
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

--
-- Dumping data for table `books`
--

INSERT INTO `books` (`id`,`title`,`category`,`isbn`) VALUES
(1, 'Visual Basic 2010 How to Program', 'Programming', 132152134),
(2, 'Visual C# 2010 How to Program', 'Programming', 132151421),
(3, 'Java How to Program', 'Programming', 132575663),
(4, 'C++ How to Program', 'Programming', 132662361),
(5, 'C How to Program', 'Programming', 136123562),
(6, 'Internet & World Wide Web How to Program', 'Programming', 132151006),
(7, 'Yong Bum Kim Operating Systems', 'Operating Systems', 131828274);
COMMIT;

drop user iw3htp@localhost;
flush privileges;
CREATE USER
iw3htp@localhost
IDENTIFIED BY 'password';

GRANT ALL
ON books.*
TO iw3htp@localhost
IDENTIFIED BY 'password';

최초로 phpmyadmin에서 import할때는 drop user 불필요

item.title: PHP 기본
item.description:
아래는 메인 .html 파일 Form을 작성될시 .php로 정보를 보낸다.

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<style>
h1{font-family:cursive;}
</style>
  <head>
    <meta charset = "utf-8">
    <title>Welcome to PHP</title>
  </head>

  <body>
    <form method="post" action="lab1.php">
    <h1>Please complete this form to submit your feedback</h1>
    <p>
    <table border = '0'>
      <tbody>
        <tr>
          <td>Name: <select name="prefix" required>
            <option value = "Dr.">Dr.</option>
            <option value = "Mr.">Mr.</option>
            <option value = "Mrs.">Mrs.</option>
            <option value = "Ms.">Ms.</option>
          </select>
          </td>
          <td>
            <input name = "name" type="text" size="25" maxlength = "30" autofocus required>
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td>Email Address: </td>
          <td><input name="email" type="text" size="25" maxlength="30" autofocus required></td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td>Phone Number: </td>
          <td><input name="phone" type="text" size="25" maxlength="30" autofocus required></td>
        </tr>
    </table>
  </p>

    <p>
      <strong>Rating...</strong>
        <input name="rate" type="radio" value="excellent">
        excellent
        <input name="rate" type="radio" value="okay">
        okay
        <input name="rate" type="radio" value="boring">
        boring
    </p>

      <p><label>Comments:
        <textarea name="comment" rows="5" cols="30">
        </textarea>
      </label></p>

      <input type="Submit" name="submit" value="Send My Feedback">
    </form>
  </body>
</html>

아래는 연동된 PHP File Form에서 주어진 name을 $_POST[]를 이용해서 불러온다.

<?php
  if(isset($_POST['submit'])){
    $prefix = $_POST['prefix'];
    $name = $_POST['name'];
    $email = $_POST['email'];
    $phone = $_POST['phone'];
    $rate = $_POST['rate'];
    $comment = $_POST['comment'];

    echo "Thank you, <b>$prefix</b> <b>$name</b>, for your comments.";
    echo "<p>";
    echo "Your email address is <b>$email</b> and your phone number is <b>$phone</b>";
    echo "<p>";
    echo "You stated that you found this example to be '<b>$rate</b>' and added: <b>$comment</b>";
  }
?>

item.title: From local to GitHub Web
item.description:
When link to a new local folder
bundle install
bundle update
To follow up with your build in a real-time Your site can be accessed from local:4000 as default

jekyll serve --incremental

To post/overwrite to the GitHub Server

git add .
git commit -m "comment"
git push -u origin master

If push command is not working, try to force push (This occurs when the remote contains work that you do not have locally)

git push -u origin master --force

item.title: [Pixel 2 XL] Downgrade from Android Pie to Oreo 파이에서 오레오로 다운그레이드
item.description:
기본적으로 adb, fastboot는 컴퓨터에

twrp.zip, magisk.zip은 핸드폰 안에 들어가 있는 전제

밑의 링크 들어가서 올리고싶은 버전으로 올리기.

OTA file 다운로드

TWRP 같은 버전 img파일 받아서 platform-tools 폴더 안에 넣어놓기

(편하게 OTA 파일은 update.zip

TWRP 이미지 파일은 twrp.img로

바꾸고 실행)

(MAC은 커맨드 앞에 항상 ./)

adb reboot recovery

패턴 걸려있으면 풀어주고

Advanced -> ADB Sideload

Swipe to Start Sideload

adb sideload update.zip

Sideload 완료 후에 폰 부팅해 보면 루팅이 풀린 것을 볼 수 있다.

다시 한번 adb reboot recovery로 부팅하면 기본 리커버리가 실행되므로

adb reboot bootloader

fastboot boot twrp.img

twrp 들어간 후에 예전부터 들어가 있던 magisk.zip과 twrp.zip

flash해주면 다시 재루팅 완료

출처: http://yk364.tistory.com/category [Developer]

item.title: Immersive Mode [without ROOT] with Edge Gesture
item.description:
Instruction below still can access NavBar by swiping up from the bottom.

(Or from certain apps, when swipe down notification bar)

  1. Enable USB debugging on your phone settings (개발자옵션 활성화 후, 두번째 세션에 있는 USB Debugging 활성화)

  2. Download and extract Google-platform-tools.zip (ADB) to your computer

(https://developer.android.com/studio/release/platform-tools.html)

  1. Launch Command Prompt

(압축해제만 해놓은 상태에서 platform-tools 폴더가 있는 곳으로 directory 설정해주고 명령 입력)

  1. Execute any of the following commands:

** Hide navigation bar and status bar **

adb shell settings put global policy_control immersive.full=apps,-com.google.android.googlequicksearchbox

** Hide only navigation bar **

adb shell settings put global policy_control immersive.navigation=apps,-com.google.android.googlequicksearchbox

** Reverse all **

adb shell settings put global policy_control immersive.full=

To completely get rid of Navigation Bar (Squeeze works)

IMMERSIVE MODE FINAL

** PIXEL 2 **

adb shell wm overscan 0,0,0,-150

** PIXEL 2 XL **

adb shell wm overscan 0,0,0,-170

Edge Gesture (Recommended Gesture App)

Immersive Mode랑 현재로서는 개인적으로 가장 잘어울린다고 생각하는 제스쳐 앱

(Android P beta 2 사용중인데 switch to previous app은 제스쳐로 안먹히는 상태. 곧 패치 될 것이라고 예상)

item.title: First Testing Post
item.description:
Just testing out code Entry

def print_hi(name):
  print("hello", name)
  print("Welcome to Python")

​

<html>
  <body>
  <h1>Just Testing</h1>
  </body>
</html>

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll Talk.

item.title: [ROOT] Disable Navigation Bar 네비게이션바 없애는 법
item.description:
Download any type of explorer which can access build.prop file. (The easiest way would be downloading Build.promp Editor app)

Grant Root Access (Press Edit)

qemu.hw.mainkeys=1

Save and Restart

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll Talk.

item.title: [ROOT] Security Patch Sideload 보안 패치 올리는 법
item.description:
기본적으로 adb, fastboot는 컴퓨터에

twrp.zip, magisk.zip은 핸드폰 안에 들어가 있는 전제

밑의 링크 들어가서 올리고싶은 버전으로 올리기.

OTA file 다운로드

TWRP 같은 버전 img파일 받아서 platform-tools 폴더 안에 넣어놓기

(편하게 OTA 파일은 update.zip

TWRP 이미지 파일은 twrp.img로

바꾸고 실행)

(MAC은 커맨드 앞에 항상 ./)

adb reboot recovery

패턴 걸려있으면 풀어주고

Advanced -> ADB Sideload

Swipe to Start Sideload

adb sideload update.zip

Sideload 완료 후에 폰 부팅해 보면 루팅이 풀린 것을 볼 수 있다.

다시 한번

adb reboot recovery

부팅하면 기본 리커버리가 실행되므로

adb reboot bootloader

fastboot boot twrp.img

twrp 들어간 후에 예전부터 들어가 있던 magisk.zip과 twrp.zip

flash해주면 다시 재루팅 완료
